A maara asụsụ Grassfields n'oge gara-aga dị ka Grassfieldes Bantu na Semi-Bantu
A na-ekewa ha mgbe ụfọdụ na ọkwa abụọ, Obosara Grassfields, nke gụnyere asụsụ niile, na warawara Grassfieldes, nke na-ewepu Menchum, Ambele na mgbe ụfọdụ asụsụ Ndịda Ọdịda anyanwụ  Grassfield
Ndị a nwere ike ịmepụta ụyọkọ nke ha, nke Nurse (2003) kpọrọ Peripheral Grassfields mana ọ jụrụ
Asụsụ Ọwụwa anyanwụ Grassfields na asụsụ Bantu na-ekekọrịta prefixes aha-nke imi, nke a na-adịghị ahụ na alaka ndị ọzọ nke Grassfield
Otú ọ dị, ha yiri ka ha nwere njikọ chiri anya na Grassfields ndị ọzọ karịa ka ha nwere na Bantu.
